```{r}
link="https://github.com/SamHenkels47/Project-1/raw/main/R%20sheet.xlsx"

library(rio)
mydata=import(link)

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
base=ggplot(data=mydata,aes(x=Country,y=SEMI_EXPORTS ))
base+geom_bar(stat="identity")
```
```{r}
plot1 = base + geom_bar(fill ="gray",
                        stat = 'identity') 
plot1
```
```{r}
titleText='Semiconductor Exports from Oregon in 2021'
sourceText='Source: US Census Bureau'

plot2 = plot1 + labs(title=titleText,
                     x ="Country", 
                     y = "Exports in Millions",
                     caption = sourceText) 
plot2

```
```{r}
plot3 = plot2 
plot3
```
